question:
Consider the following schemes:
  1. Nai Manzil
  2. Nai Raushni
  3. Ustaad
  4. Nai Udaan
  Which of the above provide empowerment to people of minority communities?
explanation: “Seekho aur Kamao”, “Nai Manzil”, “Nai Raushni”, “Ustaad” & “Nai Udaan” are some of the schemes dedicated to provide empowerment to people of minority communities.
